sentences.en: At Gibraltar we were greeted by the governor, Lieutenant General Sir F . N . Mason MacFarlane.
sentences.cn: 我们在直布罗陀受到总督梅森·麦克法兰中将的欢迎.

sentences.en: Be wary of places such as Gibraltar, Malta or Cyprus.
sentences.cn: 要提防一些地方如直布罗陀 、 马耳他或塞浦路斯等.

sentences.en: For uncounted millions, faith remains as rock - solid as Gibraltar.
sentences.cn: 对无数的信徒来讲, 信仰就像直布罗陀的岩石一样坚不可摧.

sentences.en: Gibraltar fell to their zeal in 711 and soon afterwards they took Spain.
sentences.cn: 711年,直布罗陀开始受到他们的热切关注,此后不久他们占领了西班牙.

sentences.en: Gibraltar has been called the key to the Mediterranean.
sentences.cn: 直布罗陀一直被称做地中海的门户.

sentences.en: Gibraltar is the key to the Mediterranean.
sentences.cn: 直布罗陀是地中海的要冲.

sentences.en: I tentatively decided, unless conditions should improve , to divert the expedition into Gibraltar.
sentences.cn: 我临时决定, 除非情况转佳,将远征军开向直布罗陀.
许多船在直布罗陀加煤.

sentences.en: The Gibraltar airport runway runs straight through the main street!
sentences.cn: 直布罗陀机场跑道直接穿越主要街道!

sentences.en: The Rock of Gibraltar is honeycombed with caves.
sentences.cn: 直布罗陀岩山上有许多洞穴.

sentences.en: The Strait of Gibraltar connects the Mediterranean Sea and the Atlantic Ocean.
sentences.cn: 直布罗陀海峡连接着地中海和大西洋.

sentences.en: The straits of Gibraltar are the gate of the Mediterranean.
sentences.cn: 直布罗陀海峡是通向地中海的必经之路.

sentences.en: The Straits of Gibraltar are the strategic passage between the Mediterranean and the Atlantic.
sentences.cn: 直布罗陀海峡是地中海通向大西洋的咽喉.

sentences.en: The Straits of Gibraltar have not lost their strategic importance.
sentences.cn: 直布罗陀海峡尚未丧失其战略上的重要地位.

sentences.en: This ship calls at Gibraltar on the way to Port Said.
sentences.cn: 这艘船在去赛保港的途中停靠直布罗陀.
